text: Wu Ma (real name: ) (22 September 1942 â€“ 4 February 2014) was a Chinese-Hong Kong actor, director, producer and writer. Wu Ma's career began in 1963. He made over 180 appearances to his name (plus 38 directorial credits within a twenty-five year period). Wu Ma is mostly known for appearing in many movies about the history of Hong Kong Cinema. He is best known as the Taoist ghosthunter in A Chinese Ghost Story.
